dataQuery.sqlStatement: SELECT :SHOW_CONT cyn, :SHOW_SEAL1 s1yn, :SHOW_SEAL2 s2yn, :SHOW_SEAL3 s3yn, :SHOW_DESC dyn, :SHOW_PCS pyn, :SHOW_GW gyn, :SHOW_NW nyn, :SHOW_GV vyn, :SHOW_MNS myn FROM DUAL

SELECT DISTINCT 'TSC' || j.job_xid job_no, cvr.charter_voyage_refnum_value book_no FROM job j INNER JOIN job_order_release_join jorj ON j.job_gid = jorj.job_gid INNER JOIN s_ship_unit_line ssul ON jorj.order_release_gid = ssul.order_release_gid INNER JOIN s_equipment_s_ship_unit_join sessuj ON ssul.s_ship_unit_gid = sessuj.s_ship_unit_gid INNER JOIN shipment_s_equipment_join ssej ON sessuj.s_equipment_gid = ssej.s_equipment_gid INNER JOIN shipment s ON ssej.shipment_gid = s.shipment_gid AND s.shipment_type_gid = 'TRANSPORT' AND s.transport_mode_gid = 'VESSEL-CO' AND s.is_primary = 'Y' AND s.perspective = 'B' LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment_refnum sr ON s.shipment_gid = sr.shipment_gid AND sr.shipment_refnum_qual_gid = 'CHARTER VOYAGE' LEFT OUTER JOIN charter_voyage cv ON 'SCOULAR/NVO.' || sr.shipment_refnum_value = cv.charter_voyage_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN charter_voyage_refnum cvr ON cv.charter_voyage_gid = cvr.charter_voyage_gid AND cvr.charter_voyage_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.CURRENT BOOKING NUMBER' WHERE j.job_gid = :JOB_ID

SELECT DISTINCT a.s_ship_unit_gid, a.tag_3 container_number, a.tag_1 seal1, a.seal_2 seal2, a.seal_3 seal3, REPLACE(a.descript,'|',CHR(13)) description, TRIM(TO_CHAR(a.pcs, '999,999,990')) piece_count, TRIM(TO_CHAR(a.gw, '999,999,990.000')) gross_weight, TRIM(TO_CHAR(a.nw, '999,999,990.000')) net_weight, TRIM(TO_CHAR(a.gv, '999,999,990.000')) gross_volume, a.mn marks_nums, :SHOW_CONT cont_yn, :SHOW_SEAL1 seal1_yn, :SHOW_SEAL2 seal2_yn, :SHOW_SEAL3 seal3_yn, :SHOW_DESC desc_yn, :SHOW_PCS pcs_yn, :SHOW_GW gw_yn, :SHOW_NW nw_yn, :SHOW_GV gv_yn, :SHOW_MNS mn_yn FROM (SELECT DISTINCT ssu.s_ship_unit_gid, ssu.tag_3, ssu.tag_1, (SELECT ssur.refnum_value FROM s_ship_unit_refnum ssur WHERE ssur.s_ship_unit_gid = ssu.s_ship_unit_gid AND ssur.s_ship_unit_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.CONTAINER SEAL NUMBER 2') seal_2, (SELECT ssur.refnum_value FROM s_ship_unit_refnum ssur WHERE ssur.s_ship_unit_gid = ssu.s_ship_unit_gid AND ssur.s_ship_unit_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.CONTAINER SEAL NUMBER 3') seal_3, (SELECT ssur.remark_text FROM s_ship_unit_remark ssur WHERE ssur.s_ship_unit_gid = ssu.s_ship_unit_gid AND ssur.remark_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/NVO.DESCRIPTION OF CARGO OVERRIDE') descript, (SELECT ssur.refnum_value FROM s_ship_unit_refnum ssur WHERE ssur.s_ship_unit_gid = ssu.s_ship_unit_gid AND ssur.s_ship_unit_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.PIECE COUNT') pcs, (SELECT ssur.refnum_value FROM s_ship_unit_refnum ssur WHERE ssur.s_ship_unit_gid = ssu.s_ship_unit_gid AND ssur.s_ship_unit_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/NVO.CONTAINER_GROSS_WEIGHT') gw, (SELECT ssur.refnum_value FROM s_ship_unit_refnum ssur WHERE ssur.s_ship_unit_gid = ssu.s_ship_unit_gid AND ssur.s_ship_unit_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/NVO.CONTAINER_NET_WEIGHT') nw, (SELECT ssur.refnum_value FROM s_ship_unit_refnum ssur WHERE ssur.s_ship_unit_gid = ssu.s_ship_unit_gid AND ssur.s_ship_unit_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/NVO.CONTAINER_GROSS_VOLUME') gv, (SELECT ssur.refnum_value FROM s_ship_unit_refnum ssur WHERE ssur.s_ship_unit_gid = ssu.s_ship_unit_gid AND ssur.s_ship_unit_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.MARKS AND NUMBERS') mn FROM job j INNER JOIN job_order_release_join jorj ON j.job_gid = jorj.job_gid INNER JOIN s_ship_unit_line ssul ON jorj.order_release_gid = ssul.order_release_gid INNER JOIN s_equipment_s_ship_unit_join sessuj ON sessuj.s_ship_unit_gid = ssul.s_ship_unit_gid INNER JOIN shipment_s_equipment_join ssej ON sessuj.s_equipment_gid = ssej.s_equipment_gid INNER JOIN shipment s ON ssej.shipment_gid = s.shipment_gid AND s.shipment_type_gid = 'TRANSPORT' AND s.transport_mode_gid = 'VESSEL-CO' AND s.is_primary = 'Y' AND s.perspective = 'B' INNER JOIN shipment_stop_d sstopd ON s.shipment_gid = sstopd.shipment_gid AND sstopd.stop_num = 1 INNER JOIN s_ship_unit ssu ON sstopd.s_ship_unit_gid = ssu.s_ship_unit_gid WHERE j.job_gid = :JOB_ID) a ORDER BY a.s_ship_unit_gid

SELECT DISTINCT ssur1.refnum_value pt, ssur2.refnum_value gwt, ssur3.refnum_value nwt, ssur4.refnum_value gvt FROM job j INNER JOIN job_order_release_join jorj ON j.job_gid = jorj.job_gid INNER JOIN s_ship_unit_line ssul ON jorj.order_release_gid = ssul.order_release_gid INNER JOIN s_equipment_s_ship_unit_join sessuj ON sessuj.s_ship_unit_gid = ssul.s_ship_unit_gid INNER JOIN shipment_s_equipment_join ssej ON sessuj.s_equipment_gid = ssej.s_equipment_gid INNER JOIN shipment s ON ssej.shipment_gid = s.shipment_gid AND s.shipment_type_gid = 'TRANSPORT' AND s.transport_mode_gid = 'VESSEL-CO' AND s.is_primary = 'Y' AND s.perspective = 'B' JOIN shipment_stop_d sstopd ON s.shipment_gid = sstopd.shipment_gid AND sstopd.stop_num = 1 LEFT OUTER JOIN s_ship_unit ssu ON sstopd.s_ship_unit_gid = ssu.s_ship_unit_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN s_ship_unit_refnum ssur1 ON ssu.s_ship_unit_gid = ssur1.s_ship_unit_gid AND ssur1.s_ship_unit_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.PIECE TYPE' LEFT OUTER JOIN s_ship_unit_refnum ssur2 ON ssu.s_ship_unit_gid = ssur2.s_ship_unit_gid AND ssur2.s_ship_unit_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/NVO.CONTAINER_GROSS_WEIGHT_UOM' LEFT OUTER JOIN s_ship_unit_refnum ssur3 ON ssu.s_ship_unit_gid = ssur3.s_ship_unit_gid AND ssur3.s_ship_unit_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/NVO.CONTAINER_NET_WEIGHT_UOM' LEFT OUTER JOIN s_ship_unit_refnum ssur4 ON ssu.s_ship_unit_gid = ssur4.s_ship_unit_gid AND ssur4.s_ship_unit_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/NVO.CONTAINER_GROSS_VOLUME_UOM' WHERE j.job_gid = :JOB_ID AND ROWNUM = 1

SELECT DISTINCT TRIM(TO_CHAR(SUM(a.pcs), '999,999,990')) piece_count_total, TRIM(TO_CHAR(SUM(a.gw), '999,999,990.000')) gross_weight_total, TRIM(TO_CHAR(SUM(a.nw), '999,999,990.000')) net_weight_total, TRIM(TO_CHAR(SUM(a.gv), '999,999,990.000')) gross_volume_total FROM (SELECT DISTINCT ssu.s_ship_unit_gid, TO_NUMBER(TRIM(ssur1.refnum_value)) pcs, TO_NUMBER(TRIM(ssur2.refnum_value)) gw, TO_NUMBER(TRIM(ssur3.refnum_value)) nw, TO_NUMBER(TRIM(ssur4.refnum_value)) gv FROM job j INNER JOIN job_order_release_join jorj ON j.job_gid = jorj.job_gid INNER JOIN s_ship_unit_line ssul ON jorj.order_release_gid = ssul.order_release_gid INNER JOIN s_equipment_s_ship_unit_join sessuj ON sessuj.s_ship_unit_gid = ssul.s_ship_unit_gid INNER JOIN shipment_s_equipment_join ssej ON sessuj.s_equipment_gid = ssej.s_equipment_gid INNER JOIN shipment s ON ssej.shipment_gid = s.shipment_gid AND s.shipment_type_gid = 'TRANSPORT' AND s.transport_mode_gid = 'VESSEL-CO' AND s.is_primary = 'Y' AND s.perspective = 'B' JOIN shipment_stop_d sstopd ON s.shipment_gid = sstopd.shipment_gid AND sstopd.stop_num = 1 LEFT OUTER JOIN s_ship_unit ssu ON sstopd.s_ship_unit_gid = ssu.s_ship_unit_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN s_ship_unit_refnum ssur1 ON ssu.s_ship_unit_gid = ssur1.s_ship_unit_gid AND ssur1.s_ship_unit_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.PIECE COUNT' LEFT OUTER JOIN s_ship_unit_refnum ssur2 ON ssu.s_ship_unit_gid = ssur2.s_ship_unit_gid AND ssur2.s_ship_unit_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/NVO.CONTAINER_GROSS_WEIGHT' LEFT OUTER JOIN s_ship_unit_refnum ssur3 ON ssu.s_ship_unit_gid = ssur3.s_ship_unit_gid AND ssur3.s_ship_unit_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/NVO.CONTAINER_NET_WEIGHT' LEFT OUTER JOIN s_ship_unit_refnum ssur4 ON ssu.s_ship_unit_gid = ssur4.s_ship_unit_gid AND ssur4.s_ship_unit_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/NVO.CONTAINER_GROSS_VOLUME' WHERE j.job_gid = :JOB_ID) a ORDER BY a.s_ship_unit_gid
